testsuite.name: journal article

testcase.name: new article

failure.message: assert article == null | | | false A theory of software product line refinement

testcase.failure:
Assertion failed:
assert article == null | | | false A theory of software product line refinement
at ArticleSteps$_run_closure1.doCall(ArticleSteps.groovy:14) at ✽.Given the system has no article entitled "A theory of software product line refinement"(Article.feature:8)

failure.message: assert article == null | | | false A theory of software product line refinement

testsuite.system-out:
@i9n Feature: journal article As a member of a research group I want to add, remove and modify journal articles I have published so that I can generate web pages and reports containing these articles
--Output from new article-- Scenario: new article # Article.feature:7 Given the system has no article entitled "A theory of software product line refinement" # ArticleSteps.groovy:12 Assertion failed:
assert article == null | | | false A theory of software product line refinement
at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.InvokerHelper.assertFailed(InvokerHelper.java:386) at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.ScriptBytecodeAdapter.assertFailed(ScriptBytecodeAdapter.java:658) at ArticleSteps$_run_closure1.doCall(ArticleSteps.groovy:14) at ?.Given the system has no article entitled "A theory of software product line refinement"(Article.feature:8)
When I create the article "A theory of software product line refinement" with file name "TCS.pdf" # ArticleSteps.groovy:17 Then the article "A theory of software product line refinement" is properly stored by the system # ArticleSteps.groovy:21
--Output from new invalid article-- Scenario: new invalid article # Article.feature:12 Given the system has no article entitled "Algebraic reasoning for object-oriented programming" # ArticleSteps.groovy:12 When I create the article "Algebraic reasoning for object-oriented programming" with file name "SCP.pdf" # ArticleSteps.groovy:17 Then the article "Algebraic reasoning for object-oriented programming" is not stored by the system because it is invalid # ArticleSteps.groovy:26
--Output from duplicate article-- Scenario: duplicate article # Article.feature:17 Given the article "A theory of software product line refinement" is stored in the system with file name "TCS-0.pdf" # ArticleSteps.groovy:31 When I create the article "A theory of software product line refinement" with file name "TCS-1.pdf" # ArticleSteps.groovy:17 Then the article "A theory of software product line refinement" is not stored twice # ArticleSteps.groovy:37
--Output from alternative duplicate article-- Scenario: alternative duplicate article # Article.feature:22 Given the system has no article entitled "A theory of software product line refinement" # ArticleSteps.groovy:12 Assertion failed:
assert article == null | | | false A theory of software product line refinement
